tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ingredients (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 quantity INT,
 reorder_level INT);

CREATE TABLE recipes (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT,
 ingredients_used JSONB);

CREATE TABLE orders (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 order_number INT,
 order_date DATE,
 total_cost DECIMAL(10,2));

CREATE TABLE notifications (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 message TEXT,
 sent_date TIMESTAMP,
 viewed BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE ingredients (ingredient_id INT, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), quantity INT, reorder_level INT);
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT, ingredient_id INT, order_quantity INT, order_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE suppliers (supplier_id INT, supplier_name VARCHAR(255), contact_info VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE notifications (notification_id INT, ingredient_id INT, notification_date DATE, notification_message TEXT);
CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (log_id INT, ingredient_id INT, inventory_level INT, log_date TIMESTAMP);
